places_with_reviews.name: Sukoon Retreat, Dakpathar | Best Ayurvedic Wellness Retreats in a Farm Stay
address: Near, Barrage, across Pull Number 1, Dakpatthar, Vikasnagar, Uttarakhand 248198, India

reviews.text: Visited this place to plan future stay. Literally staff is so rude and seems illiterate. Mr. Tinku (staff) stood in front of the entry gate and asked to pay to get in the property. I requested him to just let me see the property to decide for further booking but he flatly refused and closed the gate in front of me. Obviously they concern about money not service. Better to avoid. Not recommended at all.

I have nothing to crib about this place ...
I mean everything is so nice...From entrance to rooms to swimming pool...to lemonade... to food... to river side walk... to greenery... to scenery...

Oh we just fell in love.... and everyone on the staff is amazing... Pradeep bhaiyya our chef ...did some wonderful job with ingredients and bound us to eat only that food... we didn't even think of ordering or going out for food for once ...

If you want a peaceful weekend outing with serene surroundings and soul refreshing air and water.... just go for it ...

Go for it ... ❤️❤️❤️❤️

I have been here 2 times now and cant wait to go back again. The peace this place offers is what i look forward to along with the amazing food. It feels like home to me as the staff in the property is so friendly and is promptly available at your service. The bon fire nights and the foggy mornings are just perfect at this place.

Hey i visited with my partner and we felt so good and the best part is ankit the chef who served delicious food i loved to stay at this place , loved the environment and all the activities were amazing
Great place with best indoor swimming pool for kids. Staff and food is wonderful. Enjoyed my stay with kids.

I had my wedding reception and night stay at this hotel. It was the worst experience of my life the staff members harassed us in night at they were drunk and tried to come inside our room AT 2AM. despite of us telling them that the person they were looking is not in our room had to call police. It was clear in CCTV what they were upto still the property owner denied   Saying the staff member had some misunderstanding. They dont  follow the simple SOPS a hotel staff has to follow. Bed sheet was very dirty, no  toiletries Provided.  Very unprofessional behaviour and staff.
Not recommended for family.

The best hotel in vikas nagar I recommend every one . Polite staff and the nature of the prashant was very good

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Four Seasons R
address: Line Jeewangarh, FQHQ+6GP, Chakarata Rd, near Indian Oil Petrol Pump, Rasoolpur, Vikasnagar, Uttarakhand 248198, India

reviews.text: The Four Seasons Hotel R is really fancy and nice. The service is great, the rooms are big and beautiful, and the food is delicious. It's a fantastic place to stay if you want to feel pampered and relaxed.

Overall Good experience with Hotel and Property. Great ambience.
It was a pleasant stay.
Amazing stay in this hotel. Staff is always ready to help. Clean rooms. Good location.
I would definitely recommend this hotel.
The best place ever. So peaceful, service is best, staff is cooperative punctual and hospitable. Loved the ambience. Rate is very low as per the service provided.. super amazing.

I stayed here for 3 nights and the hotel was very good. The location is also very good and the petrol pump is just next to the hotel. The staff is very decent and helpful. Service was always quick. Every person in staff is very polite and responsive. The rooms are also clean with good view, rooms are very airy so you will definitely enjoy your stay. Thanks to the hotel and staff for such comfortable stay. Keshar Chauhan & Rahul Tomar made our stay comfortable, the food was also amazing.  Will definitely visit the place next time.👍👍
Superb beautiful ultimate place to spend a we time😍☺️🥰

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shaurya

reviews.text: Nice clean and spacious rooms. Awesome hospitality. Staff was polite and soft-spoken.  Mr Deepak is really gem of a person. He  explained us the cultural heritage of Uttarakhand and introduced with its cuisine.
Great place to dine in!! Quality food with great staff attitude towards customer. Perfect location to stay, very handy connectivity. Must visit again to try some other great dishes from the Menu.
Good food quality, nice service.  *visted restaurant for family dinner.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shiva Main Road Vikas Nagar
address: Near pahari Gali, Main Road, Punjabi Colony, Vikasnagar, Uttarakhand 248198, India

reviews.text: Hall is spacious and comfy. Very good service. Rooms are very reasonable and clean. On road location. All main places are nearby located. Very high recommendable.

One of the best place to stay , they are so humane, when I told them that didn't like like market food , they specially cooked for we elderly couple at home and charged nothing❤❤

You can get anything by spending but not the comforts and satisfaction, staff was nice , service was upto the mark, it's really a home away from home❤❤❤❤
Average hotel, can stay there staff was good , but  rooms are not matching any level of price to pay

An average hotel in Vikas nagar. Room was clean but small in size. Bathroom tap was not working properly I stayed in room no 104. The mattress was also hard. No ventilation available in my room and also exhaust from bathrooms leaves to corridor. Leaves pathetic smell in corridor. But if wanna stay in a budget hotel in the middle of market where you can get everything this is the place.

Very good experience. Get 2 room in 2000 for 1 night.

The only problem is kitchen is not at this hotel so they provide the dinner and breakfast from outside restorent
